The rusted city gates groaned closed, the sound swallowed by the roar of our engines. Outpost guards pointed, wagering on our chances.  We were dropping loot packs, desperate to pick up speed. Tony, in the lead, hurled a duffle bag overflowing with books.  The gate was feet from sealing us out for the night. We surged forward. Tony lunged, his foot catching on a stray reinforcement pole. A sickening crunch, then an agonizing scream that made even the jaded guards flinch.

We froze, staring at the mangled mess of garage door, pipes, barbed wire, and stop signs. Tony's foot, still trapped, hung grotesquely. We heard the medic sprinting, amputation kit undoubtedly in hand. Tony, I realized with a chilling jolt, was the lucky one. I’d trade both arms to be inside the safety of the camp.  I turned to my group. Amy hid tears under her hood. Zip pounded the ground, cursing. Dave, as always, stood silent, seemingly daring the encroaching darkness to challenge him.

The sprawling clouds swallowed the mountain peak, a grim omen.  We all knew the guards' methods.

“We have to go back down,” I said.

“Fuck you,” Zip spat.

Amy’s voice was thick with sobs. “You know what will happen.”

“We can take it,” I insisted, gesturing to Amy’s rifle and Zip’s AR.  “We have weapons for a reason.”

“He’s right,” Dave said quietly, his voice a low rumble.

“Fine…” Zip conceded.  “But you lead.”

“Let’s go,” I said, and we descended into the swirling ocean of clouds.

The descent was shrouded in deepening gloom, our morale plummeting with every foot. Dave, of course, remained stoic. We reached the infamous “Shit Show,” a sprawling bandit market where everything was for sale and no one was safe. Kidnappings, drug deals, and shootouts were the norm in this shantytown.  We navigated the chaotic streets, avoiding eye contact, our ragged clothes and visible weapons providing a veneer of belonging.

I approached a weapons merchant, knowing we needed more firepower to reach the next town.

“Watcha need, hot shot?” the old man rasped, gesturing to his arsenal.

I pointed to a wicked-looking sawed-off shotgun, two of its four barrels rusted and crudely bolted on.

“It’ll turn anything into a nice red slush,” he grinned, laying it on the counter. “Anything else?”

Amy stepped forward, rummaging through a bucket of ammo. She selected ten bullets, each marked with a different colored skull.

“Each color’s a different effect,” the merchant explained, dragging on a cigarette. “I won’t bore ya with the details, but the darker the color, the deader your target’s gonna be.”

Dave’s voice was cold. “The bunker buster grenade. Two of them.”

The merchant’s eyes gleamed. “Well, this’ll be one helluva payday for me. How ya wanna pay?”

I hefted the duffle bag of books onto the counter. The merchant’s cigarette tumbled to the steel, his apprentice taking a hasty step back.

“How…?” he stammered, staring at us.

“We’re scrappers,” I said. “Found a school a few miles out. Are you taking them or not?”

“Ye-yeah, yeah,” he said, snatching the bag and glancing nervously around. “And come back if you get any more.”

We grabbed our new gear and headed towards the next city. That’s when they attacked.

An armored car slammed into the makeshift booze fountain in the center of the market, a mounted LMG spitting fire.

Tras prácticamente once meses de descenso en las matriculaciones de vehículos, y con la previsión de que las ventas de coches nuevos en 2019 sean inferiores a las del año anterior, la incertidumbre en el sector de la automoción se deriva del desconcierto que impera entre los ciudadanos a la hora de adquirir un turismo.  El vicepresidente de Anfac (Asociación Nacional de Fabricantes de Automóviles y Camiones), Mario Armero, calcula que este contexto "provocará una reducción de las ventas de unos 45.000 vehículos con respecto a las expectativas iniciales para 2019".

Armero considera que no existe un contexto económico negativo que explique la caída de las matriculaciones. La actividad económica del país sigue mejorando —incluso las revisiones de estimación de algunos organismos internacionales lo confirman— y el desempleo disminuye. "A pesar de ello, hay gente que está retrasando la compra y, al mismo tiempo, tiene dudas sobre qué vehículo adquirir", afirmó este viernes durante la presentación de la Memoria Anual de la patronal. El vicepresidente de Anfac señala varios factores clave para entender estas decisiones: las críticas a los vehículos de combustión, especialmente los diésel; las medidas de restricción de algunos municipios, como Madrid, sin un plan estatal que las coordine; y la falta de ayudas públicas. De hecho, Anfac estima que el mercado cerrará este año con una caída del 3% en las ventas de coches. En 2018 se comercializaron 1.321.438 vehículos, tras un aumento del 7%. "Me gustaría que este pronóstico no se cumpliera", afirmó Armero, quien considera que el descenso "se puede moderar" en la segunda mitad del año si se implementara alguna campaña de ayudas.

Aujourd’hui, mardi, se déroulent les élections présidentielles aux États-Unis.  Le résultat, opposant Donald Trump à Joe Biden,  aura des conséquences pour la Formule 1 et ses intérêts dans le pays, notamment ses courses à Austin et son projet d'implantation à Miami.

La Formule 1 est un sport à forte empreinte carbone, malgré des efforts de réduction et un objectif de neutralité carbone pour 2030.  La position des candidats sur l'environnement diverge fortement. Biden promet une transition énergétique, l'élimination des subventions aux carburants et une meilleure efficacité énergétique, ce qui pourrait poser des défis à la F1.  À l'inverse, Trump, amateur de voitures sportives, ne considère pas l'environnement comme une priorité.  

La gestion de la pandémie aura également un impact.  Biden privilégierait une approche plus stricte avec port du masque obligatoire et priorité à la santé, tandis que Trump minimise l'importance du masque et privilégie l'économie. L'évolution de la pandémie, influencée par ces mesures, déterminera le retour de la F1 en Amérique.

L'influence du résultat électoral se fera sentir aussi au niveau local. Le maire d'Austin (où se déroule le Grand Prix des États-Unis) est démocrate, tandis que le maire du comté de Miami-Dade soutient le projet de Grand Prix et est républicain. Les gouverneurs du Texas et de la Floride sont également républicains.  L'appui politique local sera donc affecté par le résultat de l'élection présidentielle.

Au sein de la F1, des positions politiques se sont également exprimées. Lewis Hamilton a ouvertement critiqué Trump et soutenu Biden, tandis que Gene Haas, propriétaire de l'écurie Haas, soutient Trump.

Le résultat des élections, quel qu'il soit, présentera des avantages et des inconvénients pour la Formule 1.  L'impact sera toutefois différent selon que Trump ou Biden soit élu.  L'avenir de la F1 aux États-Unis dépendra donc en partie du choix des électeurs américains.

Finally, the last piece of this tragic puzzle.

"What happened…?" I stammered.

One officer almost laughed at my bewilderment. "Isn't it obvious? Dude died jerking off to his own Instagram."

Another officer frowned. "Look at him.

The year was 1980-something. David Draiman, a young boy from Brooklyn, enjoyed the typical pursuits of his era – perhaps Slinkys, penny boards, or those short shorts. One night, his life took a dramatic turn. He was abducted, not by earthly beings, but by the gods of rock.  While he’d dabbled in music, listening to the Beatles and other popular artists, it was merely a pastime. This night changed everything.

Following his otherworldly encounter, David moved from city to city, his focus shifting from observant Jewish tradition to the heavy riffs of rock and roll. He rebelled against conformity, seeking his own definition of "normal."  He formed bands in various cities, including Los Angeles and Milwaukee, prioritizing his newfound religion of rock over everything else, much to the chagrin of his parents.  But David was driven by a force beyond their understanding, a mission bestowed upon him by the rock gods.  As the 80s faded, so did his childhood idols. A new era dawned – the age of heavy metal.  The first time David heard Metallica, the sheer power and beauty of the music sent shivers down his spine. The symphony of vocals, guitar, bass, and drums captivated him completely.

The following decade saw the rise of bands like Nirvana, Sublime, and Red Hot Chili Peppers, further fueling David’s passion.  In 1996, fate intervened. A struggling band called Disturbed parted ways with their lead singer, and David answered the call.  He was nearing the summit of Rock Olympus, and the gods, who had patiently watched his ascent, bestowed upon him their final gift.

A strange ailment began to plague David.  He felt an unknown force building within him, an energy he couldn’t control.  It worsened with each passing day, defying any medical explanation.  Music, his usual solace, offered no comfort.  Melodies became distorted, chords refused to resolve. Only a few specific patterns resonated, hinting at a deeper meaning. David realized this was a test from the rock gods.  After months of struggle, the pressure became unbearable.  "After constant struggle, months of battling it, he could no longer contain it. It was itching to break out, to explode into the world."

The ship parted the clouds like an old sailing ship parting the waves, a rough, slipshod thing – "like a flying cinderblock," my father called it – before landing with a gentle thunk on the other side of my TV screen.  The media, the President, dignitaries I'd never know, all were there to witness it. A rope ladder, not even wood, descended from a port in the cinderblock’s side. "Goddamn it," my father laughed, stuffing crackers into his mouth, "they can't even build a ladder out of *wood*, why in the Hell is anyone afraid of these guys?"  But I was rapt.

A plume of smoke obscured the figures emerging from the ship. A *clank* echoed as the first touched Earth – a momentous occasion, we'd learn later.  Four figures walked through the dissipating smoke.  The reporter muttered a disbelieving, "*well fuck me*," before announcing the obvious: "Human! The visitors appear to be human!"

Clinking and clanking, they approached the assembled dignitaries.  Their expressions were of tearful reminiscence, echoing memories passed down through stories, paintings, and legends. One paused, touching a purple flower with the tenderness of a first love. The others waited patiently before joining him for the final steps.  Hands were outstretched, and the visitors clasped arms, nodding and speaking in elegant, unintelligible phrases.

Suddenly, a man in the back, the Italian Prime Minister as we later learned, pushed his way through the presidents and premiers of the world’s superpowers.  He shouted, interrupting the visitors, grasped a hand, shook it vigorously, and spoke rapidly. The visitors turned, bemused.

That’s when I noticed their outfits. The metallic shoulder plates, the jangling mail skirts, the helmets protecting their noses, the crests… I *knew* them.  They were different, the colors altered, the metal a dull, dark hue, the crests unfamiliar, but I *knew*.

The reporter yelled at the Prime Minister, a spectacle unfolding, his career likely over.  Then the Prime Minister laughed, a boisterous sound.  "The fuck is wrong with this guy?" my father muttered, "like the cat that ate the canary…"

The visitors laughed too. It was Greek, a language the Prime Minister, unlike the rest of the assembled dignitaries, understood.  The visitors, it turned out, were descendants of ancient Greeks, saved from barbarians by Diana, goddess of the moon, and cast into space. Now they had returned to reclaim what they had lost. Some Earth leaders invoked *our* gods.

The lead centurion whistled. Another figure scurried from the ship, catching a thrown object. He ran towards the procession. Shouts arose: "It's a spear! It's… is that blood?"  He hurled the spear.  It landed at the feet of the visitors. The centurion spoke one word that needed no translation: *War*.

They never made it back to their ship.  They drew their swords, attempting to kill the Prime Minister, and were gunned down. Hundreds more poured from the ship, fighting to the death.  My father laughed. "They think that can kill us? All this giant ships and moon-talk and shit, and they try to stab us?"  The world echoed his derision.

Then, at nine the next morning, it went dark.  Unbelievably, impossibly dark.  We brushed it off at first. A day or two, what’s the harm?  But the darkness persisted. Days bled into weeks, then months, then years.  They began confiscating our satellites, casting them adrift. Even the ISS was flung away.  But there was no other aggression, only… darkness.  Those accustomed to the dark corners of the Earth knew what this meant.

Many died, including my father, killed in the ensuing chaos.  As he lay dying, I felt my own mind slipping.  And in the sky, Diana hung, where she hangs to this day.

东北大学(Northeastern University)近日发布的“A Drop in the Bucket”研究报告揭示了一个令人担忧的趋势：美国家庭维持基本供水的费用正在急剧上涨。自2010年以来，每单位水费已飙升50%，增速远超家庭收入增长。报告预测，到2022年，将有36%的美国家庭无力支付水费。

这项研究深入分析了麻州12个社区的水费情况，发现水费上涨已成为普遍现象。例如，Winthrop镇今年早些时候水费上涨了35%，Pittsfield镇的下水道费在2019年1月上涨了50%，水费也将在今年年底上涨20%。即使在波士顿，尽管今年水费和下水道费仅上涨了2.85%，但预计从2020年至2023年，每年都将上涨3.65%。事实上，根据2014年麻州全球行动(Massachusetts Global Action)的报告，波士顿每年都有数千居民面临断水风险。

报告指出，水费上涨的原因包括老旧基础设施的维修和升级，以及气候变化导致的暴雨和洪水增加管理成本。报告作者戴维斯(Martha F. Davis)在WBUR的专栏文章中强调，水费上涨对低收入居民的影响不容忽视，呼吁地方政府采取措施提供补助。他指出，美国家庭平均每天的用水量大致相同（80至100加仑），但各家庭的承受能力却大相径庭。

研究调查显示，水费上涨给部分居民带来了沉重的经济负担。在切尔西市，去年水费上涨了8%，一位居民表示为了支付水费，不得不减少处方药的开支；另一位居民甚至因为水费太贵而放弃了自家的菜园。

报告批评现有的水费优惠政策不足以解决问题。虽然麻州大多数城镇会为低收入老年人提供水费折扣，但这仅惠及一小部分人群。此外，12个被调查的麻州社区都没有根据居民收入制定可负担性计划，仅有3个城镇提供优惠项目。而且，这些社区都没有实施分级收费或租客优惠政策。优惠政策的制定也缺乏透明度，资格认定通常由前线管理者决定，用户难以了解政策制定的渠道。报告强调，用水是一项基本人权，麻州州法也将水认定为公共资源，因此水费问题关乎人权。

报告还指出，现有的房产相关的优惠政策对拥房比例较低的少数族裔家庭不利。戴维斯强调，麻州是全国收入差距第八大的州，水费上涨对低收入家庭的影响更是不容小觑。

My name is Luke Bomberger, and I'm a Seagoing Cowboy. Joining the Seagoing Cowboys program changed my life, and I believe it could change yours too.  Why?

Because you get to help people around the world.  The Seagoing Cowboys cared for horses, cattle, and mules shipped overseas as part of a massive relief effort.  Forty-four nations joined together to form UNRRA (the United Nations Relief and Rehabilitation Administration) to help war-torn countries rebuild their food supplies and agricultural infrastructure.

For example, my friend Don Reist and I sailed to Europe in 1945. World War II had just ended, leaving many countries devastated.

Beyond the important work, there's also the opportunity to see the world.  You'll experience once-in-a-lifetime trips and create lasting memories.  Life aboard ship, especially on the return voyages after the animals have been unloaded, is a unique experience.

We kept ourselves entertained with baseball and volleyball games, table tennis tournaments, fencing, boxing, reading, whittling, and other games.

Being a Seagoing Cowboy opens up the world to you.  It's more than just an adventure; it's a chance to make a real difference.  While the work is demanding, the rewards are immense.  You'll have a lot of fun and help countless people, and that's what truly matters.

This "Innovative Practice" paper examines Reusable Learning Objects (RLOs), exploring their effectiveness based on current literature and practice, highlighting successful strategies and areas for improvement.  We begin by defining Learning Objects and reviewing relevant literature. Then, we analyze the RLO life-cycle, encompassing authoring, revising, producing, delivering, and ultimately, reusing.  This analysis informs the introduction of key factors and features designed to enhance sharing and reuse effectiveness.  Finally, we present the CourseGen framework and tool-set, which focuses on creating detailed, flexible, and reusable learning objects. This tool-set comprises open-source software and a substantial collection of open-source learning objects for Software Engineering and Entrepreneurship courses.

What are Reusable Learning Objects (RLOs)?  While Noguera et al. [1] define Learning Objects as "reusable entities either digital or otherwise used to support learning," this definition, while intuitive, is somewhat circular.  The term originated in the 1990s and has appeared in the literature with various similar definitions. We can better understand RLOs by breaking down the term:

* **Reusable:** This implies that a learning object created for one purpose can be repurposed in different contexts by different users.  This requires a flexible and appropriate level of granularity, modularity, and composability, as well as a non-proprietary data format and appropriate originator permissions, each of which will be discussed further.
* **Learning:**  While intuitively connected to learning, teaching, or education, the scope of "learning" could be broadened.  Reuse opportunities exist beyond strict learning contexts, such as grading policies or teacher-student agreements.
* **Object:** Likely originating from Object-Oriented Programming, "object" in the RLO context signifies a small, reusable unit with an abstracted internal structure.

El principal imputado en el caso Odebrecht, Ángel Rondón, presentó este jueves a nueve de sus diez testigos a descargo ante el Primer Tribunal Colegiado del Distrito Nacional.  De estos, solamente tres reconocieron conocer a Rondón, acusado de soborno.

El abogado de Rondón, José Miguel Minier, argumentó que la acusación sostiene que su cliente dirigía el comité de licitación mediante sobornos para adjudicarse 17 obras de Odebrecht.  Minier señaló que dicho comité estaba compuesto por cinco personas, tres de las cuales declararon en el tribunal.  Según el abogado, ninguno de estos exsenadores conocía a Rondón ni recordaba cómo funcionaba el Senado en aquel momento, lo que demostraría, según su teoría, que Rondón nunca participó en el comité.  Además, aseguró que se demostró la transparencia e institucionalidad en la elaboración de los pliegos de condiciones para las licitaciones, tanto nacionales como internacionales.

Los representantes del Ministerio Público y la Procuraduría Especializada de Persecución de la Corrupción Administrativa (PEPCA) calificaron la presentación de los testigos como "ficticia y una pérdida de tiempo".  Wilson Camacho, titular del PEPCA, declaró: “Lo que hemos escuchado es que esos testigos ni siquiera saben las obras que construyó Odebrecht.  No recuerdan cómo funcionaba el Senado".

Entre los testigos que asistieron se encontraban Pedro Delgado Malagón, Luis José Placeres Peña, Frank Matos, Edgar Adolfo Victoria Yeb, y los exsenadores Vicente Castillo, Amílcar Romero y Francis Vargas. Fausto de Jesús López Solís presentó excusa y la defensa desistió de su testimonio.

Delgado Malagón, presidente de la empresa Tecnoamérica, recordó solo cuatro adendas para la construcción de la autovía El Coral, un proyecto de Odebrecht en asociación con Diego de Moya Canaán, inaugurado en mayo del 2012. Bolívar Bello Belliard, exviceministro de Obras Públicas, negó cualquier relación con Rondón y afirmó que todas las licitaciones se realizaron conforme a la ley.  Frank Matos, miembro de la Comisión de licitación de Obras Públicas,  se mostró olvidadizo y solo recordó dos obras de Odebrecht. Victoria Yeb también negó vínculos con Rondón.

De los exsenadores, Vicente Castillo (Peravia) admitió conocer a Rondón. Amílcar Romero (Duarte) también lo conocía y lo describió como "un buen pagador" en el sector agropecuario, pero no recordó cuántos informes conoció sobre las obras de Odebrecht.

"Don't be ashamed of crying," I said. "You're not the only one battling this addiction. Many of my patients suffer from it."  He continued to weep, bloody tears spotting the third carpet I'd bought that week. Thankfully, my assistant had the foresight to cover the couch in plastic. My patients occasionally leave behind a finger, a foot, or even half their skin, torn from their bones after colliding with a table. Many of my former patients would have been appalled, but we live in different times. Different times, different measures, as the saying goes. The apocalypse changes everything.

When the dead started rising, I was barely scraping by as an assistant to the professor.  "The Freud of the 23rd century," they called the old fool.  If you ask me, he was a buffoon, his authority derived solely from his title, his meaningful research having ceased years ago.

"I'm not the only one?" he abruptly raised his head, as if my words had finally penetrated his decaying brain.

"Of course not," I soothed, acutely aware of the need to manage his volatile temper.

"But why am I doing it? Why? I know I could accomplish so much in my afterlife." He shook his head violently, his right earlobe nearly landing on my suit.

"Many of my patients experience the same guilt. Like you, they know killing humans is wrong."  Something in my voice must have betrayed me, because his slimy, yellow eyes narrowed skeptically.  The truth was, I didn't agree with the sentiment. It had been a pleasure watching one of his zombie friends rip that 23rd-century Freud apart.  The other assistants had fled in terror. I, however, was delighted as Jack—I think his name was Jack—tore off the professor's left arm and finally snapped his neck. It sounded like breaking a chocolate bar.  I watched with satisfaction as Jack sucked the blood from the professor's head, weeping tears of blackish blood. Then he saw me. We were alone in the university's fifth-floor hallway. Jack advanced. With a distinct sense of displeasure, I envisioned myself meeting the same fate.

My job is awful. There are good moments, of course, like when I get to play with the puppies and bathe them. Or when I'm allowed to comfort those we euthanize.  There was a big uproar a few months ago about whether kill shelters should be considered death row and euthanasia a death penalty, now that they can talk. Because they *can* talk. And since this recent development, their final words aren't just garbled nonsense.

My hands trembled as I led him from his cramped cage. It wouldn't be long now. He whined during his bath but didn't resist, nor did he struggle as I dried him. Their silence is what scares me. It makes me wonder if something will go wrong. When I asked him to lie down, he complied, gazing up at me with mournful brown eyes.

"I didn't want to do it," he finally confessed. I squeezed my eyes shut, unable to watch the unnatural movements of a canine mouth forming human words. His voice was soft, filled with sorrow. "I understand why you're doing this, but I want you to know… she had a cigarette, and it was headed for my eye. Not on accident. You understand, right? She's not a nice lady."

"I understand." *Three… two… one… breathe.* I opened my eyes, meeting his gaze. He was a handsome dog, with well-defined brow ridges and soft ears. I gently stroked one – they never said I had to be a cruel executioner. "We'll look into it." Surely I could convince them. They recorded these sessions, after all. He licked my wrist, his lips parting in what looked like a doggy smile. "I'll make sure we look into it."

"Thank you." He whimpered as I inserted the catheter. His eyes closed.  I felt my own eyes welling up.  At least this would be peaceful. As the fluid flowed from the IV bag, I petted his side, feeling it rise and fall with each shallowing breath.

El técnico uruguayo Tabaré Silva se resigna a ver cómo la crisis económica del Deportivo Cuenca reduce su plantilla. Así lo manifestó este miércoles 17 de julio de 2019 en una conferencia de prensa en el complejo de Patamarca.

Silva insiste en que la realidad económica del equipo impide retener a futbolistas pretendidos por clubes con mayor poder adquisitivo. Ocho jugadores han salido después de la primera fase de la LigaPro y podrían sumarse el defensa Brian Carabalí, pretendido por Emelec, y Jacson Pita, por El Nacional.

El DT es consciente de que el dinero recibido por el préstamo o la venta de los derechos deportivos de estos jugadores ayudará a cubrir algunas deudas pendientes con el plantel. "Es la realidad del club y debemos aceptarla", afirmó.  Por ello, centra su atención en los jóvenes valores del club.

Sobre el punto perdido en el escritorio por no presentar a tiempo los roles de pago, Silva espera que no les afecte en la búsqueda de la clasificación entre los ocho mejores del torneo.  Respecto al partido contra Emelec, reconoció el poderío del plantel rival, pero aseguró que este viernes 19 de julio buscarán un resultado positivo en el estadio Capwell a las 20:00.

## 意志和反应：从不由自主的动作到眼神的交流

语言是人类表达思想和感情最重要的媒介，而口则是其中最重要的工具。我们可以用它传递信息、表达情感，从快乐、悲伤到愤怒、焦急，甚至能展现健康状况，是声如洪钟还是气若游丝。笑声和哭声也同样表达着我们的心情，而一些细微的动作，例如吐痰，也带有轻蔑的意味。

除了口语表达，肢体语言也同样丰富。摊手表示无奈，耸肩表示不在乎，跷二郎腿表示轻松，抖脚暗示紧张，嗤之以鼻则表达不屑。

眼睛和耳朵作为最重要的信息接收工具，其中眼睛也同时兼具传递信息的功能。心理学家对“眼睛接触”进行了大量研究，发现其中蕴含着丰富的社交信息。例如，女性比男性更倾向于进行眼神接触；下属与上司的眼神接触较少；服务员与顾客的眼神接触也相对较少，一方面表示谦卑，一方面也暗示着“快些点菜”。

眼神接触的频率和时机也受到社会规范的影响。与陌生异性不宜过多眼神接触；与人交谈时，通常在讲话结束时才进行直接的眼神接触，示意对方可以开始发言；不想被打断时，会用眼神示意对方自己还未说完；在人群中，眼神交汇往往代表着交流的开始。眼神的运用多种多样，可以传情达意，可以关爱关注，也可以冷眼旁观，甚至目露凶光。

英国诗人琼生的诗句“Drink to me only with thine eyes, and I will pledge with mine.”（用你的眼波邀我共醉，我将凝眸相随。）以及歌曲《Strangers in the night》（深夜里的陌生人）中的歌词“Strangers in the night exchanging glances…We’d be sharing love, Before the night was through.”（深夜里的陌生人，眼神交会一瞬间……真情待共享？夜正阑珊。）都展现了眼神交流的魅力。宋代王观的词句“水是眼波横，山是眉峰聚。欲问行人去那边？眉眼盈盈处。”也描绘了眼神的传情达意。

然而，长时间的凝视则往往传递着不友善甚至恐吓的信号，这在人类和猩猩、猴子等灵长类动物中都存在。心理学家通过实验发现，被长时间凝视的人会感到压力和不适，例如在红灯前被凝视的驾驶员，往往会在绿灯亮起时更快地通过路口，以摆脱这种不适感。

研究表明，婴儿时期，大脑就已经具备判断他人目光方向的能力，并且更喜欢被注视的感觉。

CÓRDOBA, 19 Feb. (EUROPA PRESS) - El Ayuntamiento de Córdoba ha adjudicado el contrato de suministro de filtros HEPA y repuestos para los 87 colegios públicos de la ciudad. La adjudicación, por un importe de 499.987,49 euros, se aprobó este viernes en Junta de Gobierno Local Extraordinaria mediante procedimiento de emergencia.

The study of limit cycles in nonlinear differential systems, particularly their bifurcation from equilibria, has been a long-standing challenge since Poincaré's introduction of the concept in the late 19th century [45].  A key problem, known as the second part of Hilbert's 16th problem [23], focuses on determining the number and position of limit cycles for planar polynomial systems, a question that remains open.  This challenge has spurred extensive research, including significant contributions to the qualitative theory of differential equations by figures like Lyapunov [41], Bendixson [6], Andronov [1], and Arnold [2].

Historically, determining the number of limit cycles has yielded surprising results.  For example, Petrovsky and Landis [43] attempted to prove a maximum of 3 limit cycles for planar quadratic systems, only to be contradicted by Chen and Wang [12] and Shi [51] who independently discovered examples with 4.  Such unexpected findings fueled further interest in quadratic and cubic systems, leading to results like Li et al.'s proof [32] of at least 13 limit cycles in planar cubic systems, the current best known lower bound. These and other results have not only enriched the qualitative theory of differential equations but also found important applications in science and engineering.

This paper focuses on complete zero-Hopf bifurcations, where limit cycles emerge from zero-Hopf equilibria in higher-dimensional systems.

Night had fallen on the snowy tundra, and with it, the warmth and safety of day became a distant memory. The cold was bitter, and he had traveled far. Exhausted, he looked on, and in the distance, saw his destination—a deep red glow piercing the blackness like a forge burning bright in a long-forgotten factory.

It wasn't far now, but these last few steps would be the most grueling. Through the snow, breathless and broken, under a starless sky, he made his way toward the light.

As he drew nearer, his eyes widened, enraptured by what now stood before him: a temple of sorts, etched into the rock face, bold yet humble in its magnificence.  In front stood a man, proud and stern, as if carved from the mountain itself; his shadow, like a rearing bear, danced tall on the wall behind him, animated by the light of a dying fire.

“Who are you?” the guard said, emotionless.

Startled by the man's keen eyesight, having thought himself hidden, he promptly composed himself. “I seek answers,” he murmured from the shadows.

“You will find none here. Leave now and forget this place, or here you will remain until your lungs draw their last.”

As if both deaf and blind, he stumbled forward, heedless of the guard’s warnings, taking his first tired steps toward the heat of the fire.

What emerged from the darkness was a man admonished *of* humanity. His bloodied feet and hands were bandaged crudely with strips ripped from the rags he wore as clothes. As he moved closer, the guard remained stone-faced.

The world rejoiced at their discovery. Confirmation arrived: we are not alone. But the aftermath defied all prediction. Ten weeks after extraction from a drifting Kuiper Belt asteroid, the frozen eggs hatched within a controlled lab environment.  Initially, they seemed harmless—tiny, fragile beings with dull claws and strangely oval heads.  Scientists, maintaining constant surveillance, allowed them to mature in an isolated chamber.  Cameras recorded their every move, 24/7.

Tragedy struck three months later. The largest creature, somehow breaching the chamber wall, leaving only a gaping hole, went on a rampage. Dr. Jonas Ruthger became the first victim, impaled and torn apart by the creature's sharpened claws. He never stood a chance. The response task force, deployed for containment, discovered the creatures possessed a telekinesis-like ability to manipulate magnetic fields.  As bullets rained down, the predator conjured an invisible shield.  Two hours elapsed before its capture, subdued not by conventional weaponry, which proved useless, but by a concussive grenade.

Within a few months, they reached maturity.  The largest, dubbed “Apex,” displayed signs of leadership and exceptional intelligence.  Aware of their observation, they systematically located and destroyed every camera within thirty minutes. Plunged into darkness, we immediately mobilized the response task force, heavily armored, but as they prepared to breach the chamber, the power grid failed, plunging the entire facility into darkness.  The echoing chamber doors opened into an eerie silence, quickly shattered by screams.  Communication ceased soon after. Following the facility’s fall, we lost track of them, though the search continued relentlessly.

Three years passed before their terrifying resurgence.  They returned in greater numbers, wielding amplified power.  We were driven from our planet, our home.

يذكر أن نداء شرارة مغنية أردنية حاصلة على لقب "ذا فويس" أحلى صوت، الموسم الثالث عام 2015، حيث نالت نسبة من التصويت تفوقت بها على حمزة الفضلاوى، وعلى يوسف وكريستين سعيد من لبنان، وتميزت عن كل المتسابقات بارتدائها الحجاب طول فترة المسابقة.

قال الدكتور محمود شاهين، مدير مركز التحاليل والتنبؤات الجوية بالهيئة العامة للأرصاد الجوية، إن البلاد تتأثر بمرتفع جوي متمركز على البحر المتوسط يؤثر على شمال البلاد والقاهرة والوجه البحري، بينما الجنوب يتأثر بامتداد منخفض السودان الموسمي.  وأضاف أن حالة الطقس اليوم الأربعاء تشهد استقرارًا على معظم المناطق.

وأوضح أن الطقس يكون معتدلًا على القاهرة والوجه البحري، لطيفًا على السواحل الشمالية، لكن شديد الحرارة على جنوب الصعيد. وتسجل درجات الحرارة اليوم على القاهرة 32 درجة، وعلى السواحل الشمالية 26 درجة، وتتراوح بين 34 إلى 40 درجة على جنوب الصعيد.  وأشار إلى أن الحرارة سترتفع غدًا على أغلب المناطق لتسجل 35 درجة على القاهرة، لكنها رغم ذلك تدور حول المعدل الطبيعي لهذا الوقت من العام.  وتابع: "بداية من يوم الجمعة تنخفض درجات الحرارة مرة أخرى لتسجل على القاهرة 33 درجة".

وأكد شاهين أن حالة الطقس مازالت مائلة للبرودة خلال الساعات المتأخرة من الليل والأولى من الصباح الباكر، موضحًا أن هذه الفترة تشهد موجة تذبذب في درجات الحرارة بين الارتفاع والانخفاض بشكل مستمر.

Blockchain technology offers significant advantages, driving the need for specialized software engineering practices and modeling techniques tailored to this new computing paradigm [1].  Models are crucial for developing effective methodologies and reference architectures [2], enabling model-driven engineering (MDE) [3]. They simplify complex systems by focusing on key software development goals, facilitating early feedback on correctness, and abstracting away irrelevant details. Domain-Specific Languages (DSLs) further enhance the modeling process by providing intuitive syntax for domain experts, specialized primitives [4], and even code generation capabilities for specific domains.  Complementary models can offer valuable insights into complex phenomena.

The Unified Modeling Language (UML), a standardized graphical language for modeling software-intensive systems [5], offers partial executability [6] and extensibility through profiles [7][8].  UML profiles provide a lightweight extension mechanism, introducing domain or platform-specific elements, connectors, and diagrams [7]. While various UML diagrams offer complementary perspectives on different software system aspects, profiles tailor UML to specific domains.

Existing research on blockchain modeling, while valuable, often focuses on modeling specific instances rather than developing reusable meta-models.  For example, Rocha and Ducasse [9] modeled smart contracts using UML class diagrams, but without fully leveraging UML's extensibility mechanisms like stereotypes and tagged values. Bollen [10] employed fact-based modeling for Hyperledger Fabric, but the resulting models can be complex to interpret.  Studies on blockchain service integration and orchestration [11][12] have also employed modeling techniques like i* and UML use case and sequence diagrams [12], often focusing on requirements and contract interactions rather than detailed design. To the best of our knowledge, no tool-supported, Bitcoin-specific meta-model currently exists. This study addresses this gap by proposing the first such meta-model designed to support application development through profiling.

Building on existing research and leveraging UML, OCL, and Bitcoin's ontology, we propose a novel UML profile. This profile ensures model alignment with Bitcoin's ontology and enables automated conformance evaluation.  Alignment is achieved through the definition of specific stereotypes, tagged values, and enumerations within the profile, while conformance is ensured through OCL constraints.  Our profile has been implemented within the Sparx EA modeling tool.

The remainder of this paper is organized as follows: Section 2 introduces foundational concepts. Section 3 details our proposed UML profile. Section 4 presents a case study demonstrating the profile's application. Finally, Section 5 summarizes the study and offers concluding remarks.

Laois Kayak & Canoe Club members Brian Ogilvie, Finbar O’Donovan, and Jim Tierney paddled their way to a historic gold medal at the 2018 Liffey Descent. This victory marks the first Liffey Descent gold for any Laois club.  The Canadian Triple class team faced challenging conditions in the grueling 32km race, which started at the K Club in Straffan, Co Kildare.

Over 500 kayakers from around the world competed in this year's event, made more technical by low water levels resulting from a summer drought and the lack of an upstream flood release by the ESB.  The challenging course included 11 weirs and one portage, making the race particularly tough.  The trio finished with a winning time of 3 hours 50 minutes, acknowledging it was the toughest race they had ever paddled, making the victory even sweeter.

“The key to the race was getting a strong start and reading the river correctly,” Finbar O’Donovan told the Leinster Express. “We knew that it would spell disaster if we took the wrong route over the high drops. Luckily, we got everything right on the day.”  The less experienced competitors faced carnage on the big weirs, highlighting the skill and precision required to navigate the challenging course.

Congratulations are also extended to Laois Kayak & Canoe Club members Seamus Byrne, Matt McGrath, Patrick Marshall, and Catherine Byrne, who all finished the race with commendable times.

**About The Club**

Based in Durrow, Laois Kayak and Canoe Club offers a variety of kayaking and canoeing activities, from white water river-running and canoe polo to freestyle play boating and flat-water racing.  The club caters to all skill levels, from beginners to experts.  Affiliated with Canoeing Ireland (ICU), the club provides training and progression following Canoeing Ireland's skills award programmes, led by ICU qualified instructors.

La inflación interanual en la eurozona se situó en el 1,1% en febrero y en el 1,3% en la Unión Europea (UE), una disminución respecto al 1,3% y 1,6% registrado en enero, respectivamente, según informó Eurostat, la oficina de estadística comunitaria.

Este descenso contrasta con febrero de 2017, cuando la inflación interanual alcanzó el 2% tanto en la eurozona como en la UE.

En España, la inflación interanual aumentó cinco décimas respecto a enero, hasta el 1,2%, igualando el dato de diciembre de 2017, pero muy por debajo del 3% registrado en febrero del año anterior.

España se encuentra entre los siete Estados miembros donde la inflación creció, mientras que en 18 disminuyó y en dos se mantuvo estable.

Las tasas de inflación más bajas se registraron en Chipre (-0,4%), Grecia (0,4%) y Dinamarca e Italia (ambas con un 0,5%).  Rumanía (+3,8%), Estonia y Lituania (+3,4% en ambos casos) presentaron las tasas más altas.

Dentro de la eurozona, los mayores incrementos de precios interanuales se observaron en los servicios (+0,57 puntos porcentuales), seguidos de la alimentación, el alcohol y el tabaco (+0,21 puntos) y los bienes industriales excluyendo la energía (+0,14 puntos).

The Face on Mars: A Natural Wonder, Not an Alien Creation

Many people have seen unusual shapes in random objects or landscapes, sometimes even resembling faces.  The "Face on Mars" is a prime example, sparking speculation about alien origins. However, scientific evidence strongly suggests that this Martian feature is a natural landform, not an extraterrestrial construction.

NASA's subsequent investigations revealed the true nature of the "Face."  The initial image, capturing a seemingly humanoid visage, was a trick of light and shadow.  As NASA explained, the "face" was a "huge rock formation...which resembles a human head...formed by shadows giving the illusion of eyes, nose, and mouth."  This clarifies that the unique appearance resulted from natural processes, making it a distinctive geological feature rather than an alien artifact.

Furthermore, there is no scientific evidence supporting the existence of aliens, let alone their involvement in creating this Martian formation. While some individuals claim to have encountered extraterrestrials, these accounts lack scientific validation.  The absence of credible evidence makes it impossible to confirm the existence of aliens, much less attribute the "Face" to their activity. NASA's research reinforces the conclusion that this feature is a natural landform.

Finally, analysis of the "Face" reveals it to be the Martian equivalent of a butte or mesa, a common landform in the American West.  Geologist Jim Garvin noted its resemblance to Middle Butte in Idaho, a lava dome forming an isolated mesa similar in height to the Martian feature.  This comparison further solidifies the understanding of the "Face" as a significant, naturally occurring landform.

While the possibility of extraterrestrial life remains a topic of fascination, it's important to rely on scientific evidence. In the case of the "Face on Mars," the evidence clearly points to a natural origin.  The formation is a testament to the power of natural processes to create intriguing and unusual shapes, not a sign of alien intervention. While the search for extraterrestrial life continues, the "Face on Mars" stands as a reminder that sometimes, the simplest explanation is the most accurate.

Seeing what happens after the heat death of the universe. That was my goal.  I was young and eager to witness everything the cosmos had to offer. That, in hindsight, was my fatal flaw. Space had always captivated me, so when the opportunity arose, I foolishly fixated on experiencing it all.

Now, I regret my decision profoundly. I miss the presence of other life forms.  I used to mark the passage of time—days, then years—since my last interaction. Years bled into decades, decades into centuries.  How could I have been so naive?

My existence has become an agonizing cycle: I die, I am reborn, I die, I am reborn, endlessly. The cold of space permits me only a few minutes of life each time. How much longer must I endure this perpetual cycle of death and rebirth? I've perished 10^100000000 x 10^1000000000 times, a consequence of my misguided ambition.  All because I thought I was being clever.

This forest feels like a museum, a collection of strange, old echoes from a world I struggle to grasp.  The stillness is heavy, laden with the sadness of lives I can't reach, minds forever beyond the horizon. I see it in the paint, the veneer, the wrinkled skin of these remnants.  I thought I'd be repulsed, but I'm not. My faith in the world is only slightly shaken, a temporary tremor.

A part of me, almost involuntarily, wants to blame capitalism.  But the thought feels too easy, pre-programmed.  The endless documentaries, the talking heads – they've set me up for this connection.  Socialism is no better, and the truth is, we don't have any answers.  I'm ashamed to admit a flicker of superiority, a triggered response I loathe.  I don't have the answers; nobody does.

Yet, deep down, I can't imagine choosing this path. What were they thinking? Did this forest, like a museum to me, evoke something in them?  Were they trying to make a statement? I was always taught suicide was an act of aggression – a raging fire in the heart.  I picture them kneeling, quietly preparing, but the world played a final, cruel trick. It extinguished their rage, their victory, even their desperation, leaving only this chilling stillness.

My own confidence falters, a subtle sabotage. An eerie, distant discomfort settles in.  My conscience whispers assurances: I'm above this, my personality is stronger, my culture, my beliefs, more sane, more ethical.

But as I push aside these involuntary thoughts, these assurances I don't quite believe, I feel closer to these men.

今年亚洲棒球锦标赛将于下周在台湾开打，日前公布的24人中华队名单中，不乏林子伟（红袜）、张育成（印地安人）等旅美大联盟好手，星光熠熠，毫不逊色于世界12强棒球赛中华队阵容。然而，由于赛程与各国职棒季后赛撞期，中华队的最终阵容不得不有所取舍。

亚锦赛将于10月14日在台中开打，恰好与10月12日开打的中职总冠军赛重叠。除了比赛场地因此需要调整外，中信兄弟和Lamigo桃猿队也无法参赛。名单中的中职球员仅有统一狮队的苏智杰和富邦悍将队的陈仕朋两人。

不过，今年中华队的内野阵容不容小觑。张育成和林子伟将组成“黄金三游”组合，两人都在今年的大联盟40人名单中，因此也无法参加世界12强棒球赛。而这个豪华阵容差点就缺了一角，直到球季尾声印地安人队确定无缘季后赛，才同意放行张育成返台参加亚锦赛。

上一次亚锦赛有MLB等级的台湾选手加入，要追溯到2007年效力道奇队的胡金龙。

Semantic segmentation of point clouds has become increasingly important.  Building upon the success of 2D image recognition (Long, Shelhamer, and Darrell 2015; Chen et al. 2017), many works have attempted to directly extend 2D convolutional networks to 3D space (Maturana and Scherer 2015; Zhou and Tuzel 2018). However, these methods are limited by a drastic increase in computational complexity.  Alternatively, PointNet (Qi et al. 2017a) utilized shared multi-layer perceptrons to directly process point clouds and aggregate information through max-pooling. However, it failed to exploit local relationships between points. Due to the uneven distribution of points and the irregularity of their representation, semantic segmentation of point clouds remains a challenging task.

Boundaries play a crucial role in semantic segmentation, as many misclassifications occur near boundary points. In a point cloud, a boundary refers to the transition area between two or more objects of different categories. For example, the junction of a sofa and the floor can be considered a boundary.  Many works (Wang et al. 2018; Xu et al. 2018; Wu, Qi, and Fuxin 2019) have addressed point cloud segmentation without explicitly learning or using boundary information. Consequently, they extract features without differentiating between boundary and non-boundary points.  Critically, features extracted on boundaries are often ambiguous, as they mix features from points belonging to different categories on either side. As the network deepens, if other points incorporate these ambiguous boundary features, the ambiguity propagates hierarchically, spreading information across boundaries and leading to poor contour delineation in the final segmentation.

To address this, we propose a Boundary Prediction Module (BPM) to predict boundary points. This module provides a soft boundary prediction and is supervised by dynamically generated ground truth. Boundary prediction is simpler than semantic segmentation and likely to yield better results. Therefore, we introduce the lightweight BPM to predict boundaries and use these predictions as auxiliary information to enhance segmentation performance. The BPM and the segmentation network are trained jointly in an end-to-end manner. Figure 1 illustrates predicted boundaries in several scenes, demonstrating accurate localization between different categories and visually reflecting the BPM's effectiveness.

Based on the BPM, we design a boundary-aware Geometric Encoding Module (GEM) to utilize the predicted boundary information during feature extraction.  When aggregating local features, we restrict information sharing within object areas, preventing feature propagation across boundaries.  Mixing local features from different categories would destroy detailed information.  In subsequent encoder layers, where representative points are sampled and global features are encoded, information from different categories can transfer across boundaries to capture global scene information.  Thus, the predicted boundary acts as a barrier, preventing unwanted mixing during local feature aggregation while allowing information flow for global context.

To effectively exploit geometric information, we also design a lightweight Geometric Convolution Operation (GCO) that complements the boundary-aware GEM. The GCO focuses on the angular distribution of neighbors rather than the spatial distribution used in KCNet (Shen et al. 2018) and KPConv (Thomas et al. 2019), which are sensitive to point density and lack generalization.

El secretario de Seguridad Ciudadana de la Ciudad de México, Omar García Harfuch, sufrió un atentado a balazos la mañana del viernes 26 de junio en Paseo de la Reforma, aproximadamente a las 06:38 horas.  El ataque fue perpetrado por cuatro células de siete integrantes cada una, quienes se concentraron en diferentes puntos de la ciudad desde las 04:00 horas, tras ser trasladados en dos camionetas Suburban, una blanca y otra negra.  Entre sus instrucciones previas, estaba la de verificar el paso de patrullas de la Secretaría de Seguridad Ciudadana.

García Harfuch recibió tres impactos de bala y varias esquirlas.  Fue sometido a una intervención quirúrgica que concluyó exitosamente, reportándose estable y fuera de peligro a las 14:56 horas, según anunció la Secretaría de Seguridad Ciudadana a través de Twitter.  El vocero de la Fiscalía General de Justicia de la Ciudad de México (FGJCDMX), Ulises Lara López, a nombre de la Fiscal Ernestina Godoy Ramos, confirmó que García Harfuch se encontraba consciente y fuera de peligro, expresando su reconocimiento y deseándole una pronta recuperación.  Aseguró a la población que se hará justicia y se brindará apoyo a los heridos y a las familias de los fallecidos.

La FGJCDMX logró la detención de 12 personas originarias de la Ciudad de México, Guadalajara, Guerrero, Nayarit, Chihuahua, Michoacán, y una de nacionalidad colombiana.  Las entrevistas a los detenidos revelaron que fueron contratados tres semanas antes del atentado a cambio de una suma de dinero.

El ataque se planeó la noche anterior, aproximadamente a las 22:00 horas. Los atacantes fueron trasladados a diferentes puntos de la capital para recoger armamento y luego se posicionaron en tres lugares estratégicos de las alcaldías Miguel Hidalgo y Cuauhtémoc para interceptar la camioneta de García Harfuch. Las zonas identificadas fueron: 1. Monte Blanco y Av. Paseo de la Reforma; 2. Hamburgo y Florencia; y 3. Monte Blanco y Explanada, en Lomas de Chapultepec, siendo este último el lugar donde se consumó el atentado.

Se aseguraron diversas armas de fuego, incluyendo un fusil Barrett, granadas de fragmentación y de humo, equipos telefónicos y de radiocomunicación, chalecos balísticos, 13 vehículos, y se cuenta con testigos de los hechos.

محمد علي كلاي، روح القرن العشرين كما وصفه الروائي نورمان ميلر، واحدٌ من أبرز شخصيات القرن الماضي، بطل العالم في الملاكمة للوزن الثقيل ثلاث مرات.  ولد كاسيوس كلاي جونيور عام 1942 في لويفيل، كنتاكي، وارتقى من هاوٍ إلى حائز ميدالية ذهبية أولمبية عام 1960، ثم بطل للوزن الثقيل محققاً وعده لمشجعيه الذي قطعه على نفسه في سن الثانية عشرة.  بعدها انتقل إلى ميامي حيث شحذ مهاراته في الملاكمة وصقل عبقريته في الترويج لذاته، كما توثق  السلسلة الوثائقية المؤلفة من ثماني حلقات والتي تعرضها قناة "العربية" بمعدل حلقتين كل أسبوع.

في عام 1964، صدم كلاي العالم بإسقاطه سوني ليستون والفوز ببطولة الوزن الثقيل.  رسم قواعده الخاصة داخل الحلبة وخارجها، حيّر خصومه، وأثار اهتمام الملايين.  عبّر عن رأيه، تمسك بمبادئه وعقيدته الإسلامية، وتبنى اسم محمد علي.

لسلاث سنوات، سيطر محمد علي على الوزن الثقيل، لكن في عام 1967، رفض الانضمام للجيش الأمريكي، ما كلفه لقبه وجعله منبوذاً، بل مكروهاً في الولايات المتحدة.  توضح الحلقات كيف تم تجريده من لقبه، وإدانته بالتهرب من الخدمة العسكرية، ودفعه إلى المنفى.

عاد محمد علي منتصراً إلى الحلبة عام 1970.  في عام 1974، صدم العالم مرة أخرى بهزيمته جورج فورمان، أعظم منافسيه، في زائير، ليستعيد لقبه ويصبح أشهر رجل في العالم.  في عام 1975، واجه جو فرايزر في "ثريلا إن مانيلا"، واستمر فوزه لخمس سنوات أخرى.

في عام 1984، تم تشخيص إصابته بمرض باركنسون، لكنه واصل السفر حول العالم لنشر الإسلام، وأصبح رمزاً للسلام والأمل.

There is a portal, framed in black, a monitor.  Deceptively fragile and easily disturbed, it holds undeniable power in the access it grants.  A light, bright and multicolored, no thicker than my finger, emanates from it, displaying a million different shapes and intensities.  It calls up images, from the holiest of saints to the foulest of demons, with equal ease.

This portal opens onto all of humanity's knowledge and untold spaces dedicated to expanding that knowledge in a billion unique ways. It gives voice to ancient history and form to dreams of the future.

Through complex commands, delivered in millions of tiny lightning bolts, it allows communication across vast distances. This communication becomes a lifeline, a beacon of hope when all seems lost, even as it reveals dark deeds that bring suffering and despair to those who witness them.

تتصاعد المخاوف الأمريكية من خسارة محتملة للحرب مع الصين في المحيط الهادئ، وفقًا لتحليل مثير للقلق من المتوقع ظهوره في تقرير "البنتاجون" عن القوة العسكرية الصينية لعام 2020.  وتحذر مصادر في وزارة الدفاع الأمريكية من عدم قدرة الولايات المتحدة على الدفاع عن تايوان في حال غزو صيني،  مع تعرض قاعدة جوام، التي تضم ثلاث قواعد عسكرية أمريكية، لخطر داهم بسبب الصواريخ البالستية الصينية متوسطة المدى.

وتشير محاكاة أجراها "البنتاجون" استنادًا إلى عام 2030، حين تمتلك الصين غواصات هجومية وحاملات طائرات ومدمرات متطورة، إلى هزيمة الولايات المتحدة.  إلا أن الخطر يبدو أشد إلحاحًا من ذلك، فجميع القواعد الأمريكية في منطقة قيادة المحيطين الهندي والهادئ معرضة للهجوم الآن. ويمثل امتلاك الصين صواريخ باليستية طويلة المدى مضادة للسفن وصواريخ تفوق سرعتها سرعة الصوت خمس مرات مصدر قلق بالغ.

ويأتي هذا التحذير في ظل تصاعد التوترات بين البلدين، لا سيما بعد انتقادات الرئيس الأمريكي دونالد ترامب لتعامل الصين مع جائحة كورونا. وتؤكد مصادر دفاعية أن المناورات الحربية كشفت عن مخاوف متزايدة من التهديدات الصينية، وأن أي هجوم سيؤدي إلى خسائر فادحة للولايات المتحدة.

في هذا السياق، يطور "البنتاجون" أسلحة تفوق سرعتها سرعة الصوت ويسلح الوحدات البحرية في بحار الصين بالصواريخ المضادة للسفن.

وتعتبر تايوان "القضية الأكثر تقلبًا" بين البلدين، بحسب بوني جلاسر، مديرة مشروع الطاقة الصيني في مركز الدراسات الاستراتيجية والدولية، والتي حذرت من احتمال اندلاع حرب نووية.  وتجد تايوان نفسها عالقة في الصراع بين القوتين، حيث تدعي الصين أنها أرض تابعة لها، بينما لا تملك سيطرة فعلية عليها.  ويطالب الرئيس الصيني شي جين بينج بعودة تايوان تحت مبدأ "صين واحدة" بحلول عام 2050،  رابطًا تمثيلها في منظمة الصحة العالمية بقبولها للوضع الصيني.

Cancer is a leading cause of death worldwide, accounting for over ten million deaths in 2020, according to the World Health Organization.  There are over 67 primary sites of cancer in the human body, including brain, breast, and colon, with lung cancer having the highest incidence and colon cancer ranking fourth.  Researchers are continually working to improve cancer diagnosis, treatment, and prevention, leveraging available research tools and datasets such as genomics and histopathological whole slide images.  These datasets contain high-dimensional features reflecting the complex pathological patterns of different cancer stages, including tumor size, lymph node involvement, and metastasis.  Developing efficient and effective models to analyze these complex features is crucial for accurate cancer classification, improved treatment management, and ultimately, better patient outcomes.

Colon cancer, a malignant tumor of the large intestine or rectum, affects both men and women across all age groups. It can arise from genetic mutations or hereditary factors.  Hundreds of millions of cases are diagnosed globally each year, resulting in tens of thousands of deaths, making colon cancer the second leading cause of cancer-related mortality.  The disease is classified into four stages, from I (early stage) to IV (advanced stage), which indicate the extent of cancer progression.

A critical challenge in cancer research, and particularly in colon cancer, is accurate staging. Staging informs prognosis, life expectancy, and the likelihood of successful treatment.  Researchers are actively pursuing ways to improve prevention, early detection, and treatment of colon cancer to reduce both incidence and mortality rates, and enhance the quality of life for those affected.

Ce mardi matin, une femme d’une cinquantaine d’années s’est donné la mort dans un bureau administratif de l’hôpital Cochin (XIVe arrondissement) de l’AP-HP. Découverte par ses collègues en début de matinée, elle aurait mis fin à ses jours après de longs mois de dépression et de graves problèmes personnels.  Sur place, les représentants syndicaux ont écarté d’emblée l’hypothèse de conditions de travail difficiles, privilégiant la piste de troubles psychologiques importants. Les circonstances exactes du drame restent à déterminer, mais il semblerait qu’elle se soit pendue dans un bureau peu après son arrivée. D’après d’anciens collègues, cette ancienne soignante occupait un poste administratif depuis environ un an, suite à des erreurs professionnelles qui l’avaient écartée des soins.  Outre l’enquête de police visant à éclaircir les raisons de ce geste désespéré, une enquête interne sera également diligentée.

Imagine a classroom where every student has a computer that can detect confusion and boredom. This technology, known as the Facial Action Coding System, could dynamically adjust lessons, making them clearer and more engaging.  The benefits of such a system would ripple outwards, impacting not only individual students but also teachers, schools, and ultimately, the entire nation's educational landscape.

Students would be the primary beneficiaries.  Lessons tailored to their individual understanding would ensure comprehension and engagement, leading to increased attendance and a more positive attitude towards learning. This deeper engagement would naturally translate to improved grades and test scores, reducing stress and fostering a genuine appreciation for education.  Learning would become easier and more enjoyable, creating a virtuous cycle of academic success.

This success would, in turn, benefit teachers.  With students thriving, much of the pressure on teachers would dissipate.  A more positive learning environment would likely reduce stress and potentially even lead to increased recognition and compensation. Single-channel speech separation [1] is a fundamental acoustic signal processing task, extensively studied as a front-end module for downstream tasks like speech recognition [2] and speaker verification [3].  Often referred to as the "cocktail party problem," it aims to extract individual voices from a mixture of multiple speakers.

This highly underdetermined problem has seen the development of data-driven methods using deep neural networks [4, 5, 6].  These methods perform well on reference-based metrics requiring ground truth signals, such as signal-to-noise ratio (SNR) [7], perceptual evaluation of speech quality (PESQ) [8], and short-time objective intelligibility (STOI) [9]. However, these metrics don't perfectly align with human perception.  Models trained on them often introduce perceptually unnatural distortions, potentially harming downstream tasks [10].

Recent years have witnessed the rise of deep generative models like variational auto-encoders (VAEs) [11, 12], generative adversarial networks (GANs) [13], and diffusion models [14] for unsupervised, high-quality sample generation.  The relative stability of diffusion models has particularly attracted researchers in computer vision [15, 16]. While their application to acoustic signal processing, including speech enhancement [17, 18, 19], dereverberation [20], and separation [21, 22, 23], is still emerging,  promising results warrant further investigation.  Motivated by this, we apply a diffusion model to speech separation to improve perceived audio quality.

Two primary approaches exist for applying diffusion models to speech separation.  The first attempts simultaneous separation and generation [21, 22]. However, tasking a single model with multiple complex operations can degrade performance compared to conventional discriminative models.  The second approach refines the output of a preceding discriminative model using the diffusion model as a vocoder [23], yielding improved performance.  The stochastic regeneration model (StoRM) [18], designed for speech enhancement and dereverberation, shares a similar concept.  However, both approaches have limitations.  In [23], separation quality is refined by summing discriminative and generative outputs, with an additional alignment network predicting the weighting coefficient.  However, generation is conditioned solely on the corresponding preceding source estimate, limiting design flexibility. For example, incorporating global information from all separated sources from the discriminative model hasn't been fully explored.  In [18], the discriminative model and diffusion-based regenerator are trained end-to-end, requiring retraining the diffusion model whenever the preceding model or dataset changes.

This paper proposes a diffusion-based refiner for speech separation using the denoising diffusion restoration model (DDRM) [24].  DDRM, a conditional generative model, controls output by solving a linear inverse problem.  Because DDRM's evidence lower bound (ELBO) [25] objective can be rewritten in the same form as the denoising diffusion probabilistic model (DDPM) [14]—meaning DDRM and DDPM share a common optimal solution—our method can leverage a pre-trained DDPM with any preceding speech separation model.  Furthermore, DDRM's ability to control generation by modifying the linear inverse problem formulation allows for greater flexibility.  For example, the model could be designed to regenerate only less confident regions of the preceding discriminative output, preserving the original signal in high-confidence areas.

## CLX Communications and Juniper Research Forecast Quadrupling of Enterprise CPaaS Spending by 2022

**London and Stockholm – February 20, 2018** – CLX Communications AB (publ) (XSTO: CLX) and Juniper Research have released a new white paper forecasting that enterprise spending on Communications Platform as a Service (CPaaS) will quadruple to $6.7 billion by 2022.

Juniper Research estimates the CPaaS market grew by 50% to more than $1.6 billion in 2017. While early CPaaS adoption was primarily driven by agile, disruptive, digital-first companies, the landscape is shifting.  Established businesses are recognizing the crucial role of differentiation and personalization in attracting and retaining customers, with customer engagement becoming a key competitive battleground.

CPaaS is a cloud-based platform that allows businesses to seamlessly integrate communication capabilities—such as voice, video, and messaging—into their applications without building backend infrastructure and interfaces. This empowers them to effortlessly add features like chatbots, service agents, and contact center functionality to their customer-facing applications.

The white paper, "Communications Platforms – Transforming Enterprises into Digital Innovators," provides an overview of the CPaaS market and its growth potential. It also charts the evolution from SaaS to PaaS and demonstrates the effectiveness of CPaaS through various use cases.

"We live in a hyper-connected world where we routinely engage with friends and family using a range of voice, video, and messaging technologies," commented Robert Gerstmann, Co-founder and Chief Product Officer at CLX. "As consumers, we expect to engage with our chosen brands and businesses whenever and however we like. CPaaS enables enterprises to rapidly innovate to meet this consumer demand, making it easy to integrate a range of communication functions within existing customer-facing apps and online systems. As our white paper with Juniper illustrates, it's no longer just tech-native businesses innovating through CPaaS. Many established multinationals are now recognizing the importance of omnichannel communication for attracting and engaging the customer of tomorrow."

Dr. Windsor Holden, Head of Forecasting & Consultancy at Juniper Research, added: "The rapid pace of technological change can be challenging even for the most agile enterprises. New technologies and devices spawn new demand patterns, making it difficult to keep pace, let alone future-proof operations. CPaaS offers a highly flexible solution that enables greater scalability while reducing implementation time.  Enterprises using CPaaS can continually evolve their customer engagement channels in line with consumer demand, which is why we predict enterprise spend on CPaaS to surge in the next four years."

LONDON (AP) — The Duchess of Sussex, Meghan Markle, revealed in a deeply personal New York Times opinion piece on Wednesday that she suffered a miscarriage in July.  She shared her experience in hopes of helping others break the silence surrounding this common tragedy.

Meghan described the morning as ordinary: "Make breakfast. Feed the dogs. Take vitamins. Find that missing sock. Pick up the rogue crayon that rolled under the table. Throw my hair in a ponytail before getting my son from his crib.”  Then, after changing her son Archie’s diaper, "I felt a sharp cramp. I dropped to the floor with him in my arms, humming a lullaby to keep us both calm, the cheerful tune a stark contrast to my sense that something was not right.”

Later, in a hospital bed holding her husband Prince Harry's hand, she wrote, “I felt the clamminess of his palm and kissed his knuckles, wet from both our tears. Staring at the cold white walls, my eyes glazed over. I tried to imagine how we’d heal.”  The couple have an 18-month-old son, Archie.  Meghan wrote, “Losing a child means carrying an almost unbearable grief, experienced by many but talked about by few. In being invited to share our pain, together we take the first steps toward healing.”

Britain’s National Health Service estimates that about one in eight pregnancies in which a woman is aware she is pregnant ends in miscarriage.  Sophie King, a midwife at U.K. child-loss charity Tommy’s, praised Meghan's openness. "Her honesty and openness today send a powerful message to anyone who loses a baby: this may feel incredibly lonely, but you are not alone,” King said.  King added that miscarriage and stillbirth remain “a real taboo in society, so mothers like Meghan sharing their stories is a vital step in breaking down that stigma and shame.”

Buckingham Palace declined to comment, stating it was “a deeply personal matter.”

Meghan, 39, an American actress and star of TV legal drama “Suits,” married Harry, a grandson of Queen Elizabeth II, in May 2018.  Early this year, the couple stepped back from royal duties and relocated to North America, citing what they described as unbearable media intrusion and racist attitudes. They recently purchased a house in Santa Barbara, California.

The duchess is currently involved in a legal battle with the publisher of Britain’s Mail on Sunday newspaper over articles that published portions of a private letter she wrote to her estranged father after her wedding.  Last month, a London judge granted Meghan’s request to postpone the trial until fall 2021, keeping the reasons for the delay confidential.

Médicos del Mundo ha hecho un llamamiento a las autoridades sanitarias europeas para que garanticen el acceso de la población migrante a los sistemas de atención sanitaria en Italia.  El país se ha convertido en el principal receptor de migrantes, debido a la situación en Libia y el acuerdo entre la Unión Europea y Turquía.  En el último año, Italia ha recibido a más de 180.000 migrantes, con más de 5.000 fallecidos registrados. Nigeria es el principal país de origen (19%), seguido de Eritrea, Gambia, Egipto y también zonas de Asia como Bangladesh.  Alarmantemente, el 15 por ciento (unos 25.000), el doble que el año anterior, eran menores no acompañados, según datos de esta organización humanitaria.

Por ello, Médicos del Mundo exige garantizar condiciones de acogida adecuadas que cumplan con los estándares de la intervención humanitaria.  Esto incluye refugios, instalaciones sanitarias, atención médica y acceso a la información.  También solicitan una protección jurídica satisfactoria para los más vulnerables, especialmente mujeres y menores.

Médicos del Mundo tiene un amplio operativo desplegado en Reggio Calabria.  Este operativo incluye una unidad móvil para consultas médicas en el puerto, otra especializada en atención psicosocial, y atención sanitaria en cuatro centros de primera acogida: Scatolone, Capitaneria, Montebello y Rosali.  Además, ofrecen servicios de intérpretes durante el desembarco, mediación cultural y  información sobre el derecho a la protección internacional a través de un equipo de trabajadores sociales.

Hasta el 30 de noviembre, registraron 1.055 visitas médicas en estos centros, muchas por quemaduras sufridas durante la travesía.  Repartieron más de 3.000 folletos informativos en el puerto y casi 1.200 menores participaron en actividades psicosociales.  Para los menores, las actividades grupales como el juego, el dibujo y la musicoterapia, gracias al voluntariado del museo de instrumentos de la región, son especialmente importantes. Con el apoyo de Médicos del Mundo, los niños han creado su propio boletín de noticias, 'Giornalino'.  Además, se proporcionó formación especializada a 300 profesionales, voluntarios y organizaciones locales. En este contexto, la formación en salud mental es crucial para gestionar "reacciones normales ante situaciones anormales", según una psicóloga de la organización.

Deep Neural Networks (DNNs) have achieved remarkable success in critical applications such as facial recognition (Schroff, Kalenichenko, and Philbin 2015), medical diagnostics (Peng et al. 2021), and autonomous driving (Tian et al. 2018). However, despite these achievements, DNNs remain susceptible to adversarial examples (Szegedy et al. 2014; Biggio et al. 2013).  Existing methods for generating adversarial examples primarily focus on two approaches:  L<sub>p</sub>-norm restricted attacks (Goodfellow, Shlens, and Szegedy 2015; Kurakin, Goodfellow, and Bengio 2017; Madry et al. 2018; Carlini and Wagner 2017; Moosavi-Dezfooli, Fawzi, and Frossard 2016) and unrestricted attacks (Brown et al. 2017; Hosseini and Poovendran 2018; Bhattad et al. 2020; Song et al. 2018; Qiu et al. 2020; Yuan et al. 2022).

L<sub>p</sub>-norm attacks constrain perturbations to the raw pixel-space within a bounded norm to maintain photorealism.  Unrestricted attacks, on the other hand, employ methods like geometric distortions (Guo et al. 2018), color/texture changes (Hosseini and Poovendran 2018; Bhattad et al. 2020; Yuan et al. 2022), and semantic alterations (Qiu et al. 2020; Song et al. 2018).  A key limitation of most existing methods is the assumption that an attacker can freely modify any feature. This assumption is unrealistic in real-world scenarios.  For example, accessing the digital input of an image recognition model might be intractable, making pixel-space perturbations infeasible.  Furthermore, simply altering alterable features while ignoring the induced changes on other features overlooks the inherent causal relationships between them – a crucial aspect underappreciated by existing methods.

Consider a credit scoring model.  Altering an applicant's income without adjusting the debt-to-income ratio is unrealistic, as the latter is directly influenced by the former.  This highlights the need to consider the causal generating process when crafting adversarial examples for practical applications.

This work introduces CADE, a framework for generating Counterfactual ADversarial Examples that incorporates the causal generating process.  CADE addresses two fundamental questions: 1) *Where to attack*: identifying vulnerable variables through a causal lens; and 2) *How to attack*: leveraging the causal generating process to create realistic adversarial examples.

To determine *where to attack*, CADE analyzes the vulnerability of discriminative DNNs to interventional data, exploiting their inability to reason causally, unlike human perception. For instance, a DNN might misclassify a car in space as a satellite, relying on the background rather than the object's inherent features (Figure 1).  CADE addresses this by explicitly analyzing the effects of interventions, guiding both observable and latent attacks.

To determine *how to attack*, CADE utilizes the concept of counterfactuals – predicting the consequences of interventions on variables given an observation.  Figure 1 illustrates this: intervening on the background changes the image while preserving other characteristics (color, shape) represented by exogenous variables. L'ancien capitaine des Olympiques de Gatineau, Alexandre Carrier, a été rappelé par les Predators de Nashville dans la Ligue nationale de hockey (LNH). Le défenseur de 23 ans a rejoint ses coéquipiers en Californie pour deux matchs en deux soirs ce week-end.

Alors qu'il était sur la route avec les Admirals de Milwaukee, son équipe de la Ligue américaine de hockey (LAH), Carrier a reçu l'appel de Scott Nichol, directeur général du club-école des Predators.

« Ça fait maintenant presque trois ans jour pour jour que je n'avais pas été rappelé, donc j'étais vraiment content. J'ai appelé mes parents et ma copine tout de suite », raconte le défenseur droitier, qui n'a disputé que deux matchs dans la LNH, en janvier 2017.

Sa famille n'avait pas pu assister à ses débuts dans la grande ligue.  Cette fois-ci sera différente. « Mes parents, ma copine et mon frère sont en route pour Los Angeles. Ça va être excitant, si je suis dans l'alignement, de jouer devant eux », confie le joueur de 1,83 m (6 pieds) et 82 kg (181 lb).

Nashville affronte les Kings de Los Angeles samedi soir, puis les Ducks d'Anaheim le lendemain. Carrier ne prévoit pas jouer la première rencontre, mais devrait être en uniforme dimanche. « On verra. Ils m'ont juste dit de me tenir prêt », explique-t-il.

Ce rappel est indirectement lié au coup de coude vicieux que Corey Perry, attaquant des Stars de Dallas, a asséné à la tête de Ryan Ellis lors de la Classique hivernale.  Perry a écopé de cinq matchs de suspension, et Ellis est sur la liste des blessés.  Pour pallier son absence, le directeur général des Predators, David Poile, a donc fait appel à l'ancien joueur du Centre Robert-Guertin.  Cette saison, avec les Admirals, le Québécois a cumulé quatre buts et 21 passes, affichant un différentiel de +9.

Si l'absence d'Ellis se prolonge, Carrier pourrait manquer le match des étoiles de la LAH, prévu les 26 et 27 janvier. « C'est un couteau à double tranchant, mais je veux rester avec les Predators le plus longtemps possible », admet-il.

Il y avait déjà participé en 2017, à seulement 20 ans. « Si je reste avec l'équipe jusque-là, ce n'est pas grave. C'est un bel honneur, une belle expérience, mais je l'ai déjà vécue. Mon objectif principal est de rester ici », affirme celui qui fut un choix de quatrième ronde des Predators en 2015.

À sa quatrième saison professionnelle, Alexandre Carrier ne compte pas faire du tourisme dans l'élite mondiale. Il espère que ses performances convaincront David Poile de lui faire une place, même au retour de Ryan Ellis.

El gigante indio Reliance aspira a conquistar el mercado de telefonía móvil con un dispositivo de 50 dólares, proyectando ventas de entre 150 y 200 millones de unidades en dos años.  Esta ambiciosa estrategia, que recuerda a la disrupción que Reliance Jio causó en el sector de las telecomunicaciones,  supone un desafío directo a competidores como Xiaomi.  La compañía, liderada por Mukesh Ambani, ya se encuentra en negociaciones con ensambladores locales como Dixon Technologies India, Lava International y Karbonn Mobiles para producir una versión de su teléfono Jio, compatible con Android y con un precio aproximado de 4.000 rupias (54 dólares).  Este movimiento se alinea con la política gubernamental de impulsar la fabricación nacional, representando un importante estímulo para la industria local, que ensambló alrededor de 165 millones de smartphones en el último año.

La estrategia de Reliance se basa en combinar estos teléfonos económicos con los planes de bajo costo de su operador, Reliance Jio.  Ambani busca replicar el éxito obtenido en el sector de las telecomunicaciones, donde sus agresivos precios y la simplicidad de sus planes lo catapultaron a una posición dominante.  Este nuevo dispositivo podría acelerar la consolidación del imperio de Ambani, que abarca desde el comercio electrónico hasta las redes sociales y los videojuegos, aprovechando la enorme base de casi 400 millones de usuarios de Jio, muchos de los cuales utilizan teléfonos básicos de segunda generación.

El mercado potencial es inmenso.  En India, donde el PIB per cápita ronda los 2.000 dólares, el acceso a internet móvil, incluso a través de versiones lite de aplicaciones como WhatsApp o YouTube, se ha vuelto esencial.  Este factor explica que las tres cuartas partes de las ventas en el segundo trimestre de 2020 correspondieran a dispositivos básicos con precios entre 100 y 250 dólares, según Counterpoint.  Reliance, con su teléfono 4G, se dirige a los aproximadamente 350 millones de usuarios de teléfonos básicos, un segmento que Ambani describió recientemente como “atrapado en la era 2G”.

La pandemia ha acelerado la necesidad de actualizar los dispositivos, creando nuevas oportunidades.  Un ejemplo es la creciente demanda de teléfonos para que los niños puedan seguir las clases online.  Se estima que en India hay 250 millones de niños entre 6 y 16 años.  Neil Shah, director de investigación de Counterpoint, señala que si Reliance logra que un 10% de este segmento adquiera el nuevo dispositivo, la compañía podría convertirse en una de las marcas líderes de smartphones en 2021.  Además, la popularización de este teléfono impulsaría las perspectivas de Jio Platforms y, según Shah,  "Jio tiene la oportunidad de apuntar a más de 500 millones de indios que no poseen un teléfono inteligente y generar una oportunidad en el mercado del océano azul".  La colaboración con proveedores indios también impactaría negativamente a fabricantes chinos como Xiaomi, quienes, según Shah, "perderán una oportunidad potencial y participación de mercado".  El rival de Reliance, Bharti Airtel, también está explorando la posibilidad de desarrollar su propio dispositivo 4G, según medios locales.  Reliance, por su parte, lleva al menos dos años trabajando en prototipos y, aunque probablemente no llegue a tiempo para la temporada de compras de Diwali en noviembre,  tiene la capacidad de lanzar rápidamente el teléfono al mercado.  Ambani ha conseguido atraer más de 20 mil millones de dólares en inversiones de gigantes como Facebook para Jio Platforms, la subsidiaria encargada del proyecto.
